import React, { useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; function FormCustomer() { const [rows, setRows] = useState([]); const show = () => { axios.get('/customer').then((response) => { console.log(response); setRows(response.data); }); }; return (
{rows.map((row) => ( ))}
Customer ID Customer Name Customer City Customer Street Gender Address
{row.customer_id} {row.customer_name} {row.customer_city} {row.customer_street} {row.gender} {row.address}
); } export default FormCustomer;
